About me

I love designing systems that make complex work feel simple. My work spans product engineering, platform tooling, and the connective tissue that keeps teams shipping with confidence.

Recent projects include accelerating CI pipelines, shipping accessible design systems, and building observability-first services. I enjoy pairing with designers, PMs, and operators to turn fuzzy problems into shipped features.

Here are a few tools I reach for often:

  • TypeScript
  • React
  • Node
  • Go
  • PostgreSQL
  • AWS

Where I’ve worked

Senior Software Engineer @ Northwind Labs

2021 — Present

  • Led delivery of a feature-flag platform serving 60+ services with sub-200ms p99 latency.
  • Cut deploy lead time by 40% by standardizing CI/CD templates and observability checks.
  • Mentored engineers through promotions via pairing, reviews, and roadmap planning.

Software Engineer @ Atlas Systems

2018 — 2021

  • Built internal tools that reduced support backlog by automating remediation flows.
  • Reworked API gateway auth, improving throughput 3x while tightening audit coverage.
  • Partnered with design to ship a refreshed dashboard that cut onboarding time by 25%.
